english.segment1: Theres a different sunrise. Its a different world. In a way I feel like. I have just begun
english.segment2: Like I dont remember. Waking up from a dream. All my chains are broken. And it feels so free
english.segment3: I can breathe for the first time. I can see for the first time. Its like you opened my eyes. I can feel my heart is coming alive. I feel alive. I can breathe for the first time. For the first time. For the first time. Oooo Ooooo Oooo. For the first time. For the first time
english.segment4: Once a life imprisoned. I was locked in the past. But your love has given. Given one more chance
english.segment5: Once my light was fading. But you gave me yours. Now my world is brighter. Than it was before
english.segment6: I can breathe for the first time. I can see for the first time. Its like you opened my eyes. I can feel my heart is coming alive. I feel alive. I can breathe for the first time. For the first time. For the first time. Oooo Ooooo Oooo. For the first time. For the first time
english.segment7: And Ive never run so far. Ive never felt so strong. When I am where you are. I found where I belong. For the first time. For the first time
english.segment8: I can breathe for the first time. I can see for the first time. Its like you opened my eyes. I can feel my heart is coming alive. I feel alive. I can breathe for the first time. For the first time. For the first time. Oooo Ooooo Oooo. For the first time. For the first time
